Detailed Description

Exception type thrown when attempting to create an invalid utility::simple_date.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

utility::date_exception::date_exception (  const char *const   msg  ) 
 

Create a date_exception object with the specified text. date_exception is derived from std::exception; this message will be reported by calling the what() method.
